properties.name: secureHeaderPatterns.enabled
properties.description: Enables or disables filters in logging starter

properties.name: logging-starter.filter.secure-json-body-paths
properties.description: Json paths like a 'jsonVal.jsonVal.jsonVal ...' that will be defended.

properties.name: logging-starter.filter.without-logging
properties.description: Patterns of endpoint strings to which no logging is needed.
